Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
heckling \heckling\ n. [vb. n. from {heckle}[2].] Shouting in order to interrupt a speech with which the shouter disagrees.
Syn: barracking. [WordNet 1.5]
heckling n : shouting to interrupt a speech with which you disagree [syn: {barracking}]
